TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit GregorianCalendar extends System.Globalization.Calendar

summary.span: 代表西曆。

span.span: Represents the Gregorian calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 西曆會辨識兩個紀元：B.C.The Gregorian calendar recognizes two eras: B.C. 或年和 A.D.or B.C.E., and A.D. or C.E.or C.E. 這個實作類別能夠辨識只有在目前紀元 （A.D.This implementation of the class recognizes only the current era (A.D. 或 C.E.）。or C.E.). > [!NOTE] > 如需有關使用資訊類別和其他的行事曆 .NET Framework 中的類別，請參閱 < [ 使用行事曆](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md)。For information about using the class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md). 閏年西曆中被定義為年份為整除 4，除非它是以 100 整除。A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a year that is evenly divisible by 4, unless it is divisible by 100. 不過，由 400 整除的年份是閏年。However, years that are divisible by 400 are leap years. 比方說，1900 年不是閏年，但 2000 年。For example, the year 1900 was not a leap year, but the year 2000 was. 一般年份有 365 天，閏年有 366 天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 西曆會有 12 個月 28 至 31 天每個：年 1 月 （31 天）、 2 月 (28 或 29 天)、 年 3 月 （31 天）、 年 4 月 （30 天），5 （31 天）、 年 6 月 （30 天），7 月 （31 天）、 年 8 月 （31 天）、 年 9 月 （30 天）、 年 10 月 （31 天）、 年 11 月 （30 天） 和年 12 月 （31 天）。The Gregorian calendar has 12 months with 28 to 31 days each: January (31 days), February (28 or 29 days), March (31 days), April (30 days), May (31 days), June (30 days), July (31 days), August (31 days), September (30 days), October (31 days), November (30 days), and December (31 days). 二月有 29 天，閏年和 28。February has 29 days during leap years and 28 during common years. > [!IMPORTANT] > 根據預設，所有和值 express 中的西曆日期和時間。By default, all and values express dates and times in the Gregorian calendar. 西曆已開發為凱撒曆法的取代項目 (代表類別) 首度引進的一小部分的文化特性，1582 年 10 月 15 號上。The Gregorian calendar was developed as a replacement for the Julian calendar (which is represented by the class) and was first introduced in a small number of cultures on October 15, 1582. 使用歷程記錄的日期之前的西曆的文化特性的採用，您應該使用原始的行事曆，如果它是.NET Framework 中可用。When working with historic dates that precede a culture's adoption of the Gregorian calendar, you should use the original calendar if it is available in the .NET Framework. 比方說，丹麥從變更凱撒曆法為西曆年 2 月 19 （在凱撒曆法） 或年 3 月 （以西曆） 的 1 為 1700年。For example, Denmark changed from the Julian calendar to the Gregorian calendar on February 19 (in the Julian calendar) or March 1 (in the Gregorian calendar) of 1700. 在此案例中，日期早於西曆的採用，您應該使用凱撒曆法。In this case, for dates before the adoption of the Gregorian calendar, you should use the Julian calendar. 不過，請注意，任何文化特性會提供內建支援類別。However, note that no culture offers intrinsic support for the class. 您必須使用類別做為獨立曆法。You must use the class as a standalone calendar. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用行事曆](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md)。For more information, see [Working with calendars](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md). 下列範例說明為 1700 年 2 月 18，到凱撒曆法，也就是在丹麥正式使用凱撒曆法的最後一天，是早於 1700 年 3 月 1，西曆中的一天。The following example illustrates that February 18, 1700 in the Julian calendar, which is the last day the Julian calendar was officially used in Denmark, is one day earlier than March 1, 1700 in the Gregorian calendar. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.gregoriancalendar.class/cs/minimum1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.gregoriancalendar.class/vb/minimum1.vb#1)] 每個支援一組的行事曆。Each supports a set of calendars. 屬性傳回的文化特性的預設月曆，屬性會傳回陣列，包含所有支援的文化特性的行事曆。The property returns the default calendar for the culture, and the property returns an array containing all the calendars supported by the culture. 若要變更所使用的行事曆，應用程式可以設定屬性，以新。To change the calendar used by a , the application can set the property to a new . 會忽略標點符號紀元縮寫的名稱中，只有當中選取和文化特性會使用 「 A.D." ignores punctuation in abbreviated era names, only if the is selected in and the culture uses "A.D." 為紀元名稱時，也就是 「 A.D."as the era name, that is, "A.D." 相當於"AD"。is equivalent to "AD". ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示月曆是西曆和文化特性使用紀元名稱"西元 」 時，才會忽略在紀元名稱中，標點符號。The following code example shows that ignores the punctuation in the era name, only if the calendar is Gregorian and the culture uses the era name "A.D.". [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.GetEra#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.GetEra/CPP/gregorian_getera.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.GetEra#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.GetEra/CS/gregorian_getera.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.GetEra#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.GetEra/VB/gregorian_getera.vb#1)]

span.span: The to which to add months.
The number of months to add.

summary.span: 傳回也就是指定的相差指定月數。

span.span: Returns a that is the specified number of months away from the specified .

returns.span: 所產生將指定的月數加入指定。

span.span: The that results from adding the specified number of months to the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生的日期部分產生的日期不在產生的月份，產生的 year 的有效日期會受到影響。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它會變更為產生的 year 之產生的月份中最後一個有效的日期。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 產生的年份部分產生的月份超出指定的年份會受到影響。The year part of the resulting is affected if the resulting month is outside the year of the specified . 此實作會支援目前的紀元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，產生的 year 超出指定的紀元便會擲回。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 產生的日期時間部分維持不變，與指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 比方說，如果指定的月份是 10 月有 31 天，指定某一天，而且該月第 31 天的值`months`參數為 6，則產生的 year 是個以上的指定年份中，產生的月份是年 4 月和產生的資料y 是第 30 天，也就是在 4 月的最後一天。For example, if the specified month is October, which has 31 days, the specified day is the 31st day of that month, and the value of the `months` parameter is 6, the resulting year is one more than the specified year, the resulting month is April, and the resulting day is the 30th day, which is the last day in April. 如果值`months`參數是負值，產生早於指定。If the value of the `months` parameter is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 屬性傳回之值一律等於。The property of the returned value always equals . 您可以保留的屬性`time`藉由呼叫的參數方法，如下列範例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#5)] ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示數個元件的值根據西曆。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Gregorian calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet/CPP/gregoriancalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet/CS/gregoriancalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet/VB/gregoriancalendar_addget.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生的日期部分產生的日期不在產生的月份，產生的 year 的有效日期會受到影響。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它會變更為產生的 year 之產生的月份中最後一個有效的日期。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 產生的月份部分維持不變，與指定。The month part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 此實作會支援目前的紀元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，產生的 year 超出指定的紀元便會擲回。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 產生的日期時間部分維持不變，與指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 比方說，二月有 28 天，除了有 29 天潤年期間。For example, February has 28 days, except during leap years when it has 29 days. 指定的日期是否在閏年中的 2 月 29 日，而`years`為 1，則產生的日期會在下一年度的 2 月的第 28 天。If the specified date is the 29th day of February in a leap year and the value of `years` is 1, the resulting date will be the 28th day of February in the following year. 如果`years`是負數，產生早於指定。If `years` is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 屬性傳回之值一律等於。The property of the returned value always equals . 您可以保留的屬性`time`藉由呼叫的參數方法，如下列範例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#8)] ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示數個元件的值根據西曆。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Gregorian calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet/CPP/gregoriancalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet/CS/gregoriancalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet/VB/gregoriancalendar_addget.vb#1)]

span.span: An integer from 1 to 366 that represents the day of the year in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 年中的日被指從當年第一日的天數。The day of the year is defined as the number of days from the first day of the year. 例如，的第一個月的第一天，則傳回 1，並的上個月的最後一天會傳回該年份中的總天數，這相同的值由。For example, for the first day of the first month returns 1, and for the last day of the last month returns the total number of days in that year, which is the same value returned by . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示數個元件的值根據西曆。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Gregorian calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet/CPP/gregoriancalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet/CS/gregoriancalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet/VB/gregoriancalendar_addget.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 西曆會辨識兩個紀元：B.C.The Gregorian calendar recognizes two eras: B.C. 或年和 A.D.or B.C.E., and A.D. or C.E.or C.E. 這個實作類別能夠辨識只有在目前紀元 （A.D.This implementation of the class recognizes only the current era (A.D. 或 C.E.）。or C.E.). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示數個元件的值根據西曆。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Gregorian calendar. span.span: An integer that represents the year.

param.name: month
param.span: 從 1 到 12 的整數，表示月份。

span.span: An integer from 1 to 12 that represents the month.

param.name: day
param.span: 從 1 到 31 的整數，表示日期。

span.span: An integer from 1 to 31 that represents the day.
An integer that represents the era.

summary.span: 判斷指定紀元中指定的日期是否為閏日。

span.span: Determines whether the specified date in the specified era is a leap day.

returns.span: 如果指定的日期為閏日，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the specified day is a leap day; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 閏年西曆中定義為一年整除的四個，除非它是整除 100。A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100. 不過，由 400 整除的年份是閏年。However, years that are divisible by 400 are leap years. 比方說，1900 年不是閏年，但 2000 年。For example, the year 1900 was not a leap year, but the year 2000 was. 一般年份有 365 天，閏年有 366 天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 為閏日是閏年只會發生一天。A leap day is a day that occurs only in a leap year. 在西曆年 2 月 29 日會是唯一的閏日。In the Gregorian calendar, the 29th day of February is the only leap day. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會呼叫第二個月 （二月），每個紀元中的五年的最後一天 IsLeapDay。The following code example calls IsLeapDay for the last day of the second month (February) for five years in each of the eras. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.IsLeapDay/CPP/gregoriancalendar_isleapday.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.IsLeapDay/CS/gregoriancalendar_isleapday.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.IsLeapDay/VB/gregoriancalendar_isleapday.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 閏年西曆中定義為一年整除的四個，除非它是整除 100。A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100. 不過，由 400 整除的年份是閏年。However, years that are divisible by 400 are leap years. 比方說，1900 年不是閏年，但 2000 年。For example, the year 1900 was not a leap year, but the year 2000 was. 一般年份有 365 天，閏年有 366 天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 閏月是一整個月，只會發生在為閏年。A leap month is an entire month that occurs only in a leap year. 西曆沒有任何閏月。The Gregorian calendar does not have any leap months. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會呼叫 IsLeapMonth 目前紀元中的五年的所有月份。The following code example calls IsLeapMonth for all the months in five years in the current era. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.IsLeapMonth#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.IsLeapMonth/CPP/gregoriancalendar_isleapmonth.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.IsLeapMonth#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.IsLeapMonth/CS/gregoriancalendar_isleapmonth.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.IsLeapMonth#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.IsLeapMonth/VB/gregoriancalendar_isleapmonth.vb#1)]

span.span: The earliest date and time supported by the type, which is the first moment of January 1, 0001 C.E.
and is equivalent to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然值屬性是年 1 月 1 日的第一時間公元 0001，西曆當時並未引入 1582 年 10 月 15，直到其採用整個大陸或全球歐洲很緩慢。Although the value of the property is the first moment of January 1, 0001 C.E., the Gregorian calendar was not introduced until October 15, 1582, and its adoption throughout the European continent and worldwide was slow. 大部分的文化特性，在歐洲、 美國和澳洲各大洲它們採用西曆，直到使用凱撒曆法，由表示類別。Until they adopted the Gregorian calendar, most cultures in the European, American, and Australian continents used the Julian calendar, which is represented by the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會取得的最小值和行事曆的最大值。The following code example gets the minimum value and the maximum value of the calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_MinMax/CPP/gregoriancalendar_minmax.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_MinMax/CS/gregoriancalendar_minmax.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_MinMax/VB/gregoriancalendar_minmax.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override int ToFourDigitYear (int year);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 ToFourDigitYear(int32 year) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToFourDigitYear (year As Integer) As Integer
public: override int ToFourDigitYear(int year);
override this.ToFourDigitYear : int -> int

param.name: year
param.span: 兩位數或四位數的整數，表示要轉換的年份。

span.span: A two-digit or four-digit integer that represents the year to convert.

summary.span: 將指定的年份轉換所使用的四位數年份屬性來判斷適當的世紀。

span.span: Converts the specified year to a four-digit year by using the property to determine the appropriate century.

returns.span: 整數，包含 的四位數表示。

span.span: An integer that contains the four-digit representation of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是由兩位數年份的 100 年範圍中的最後一年。 is the last year in the 100-year range that can be represented by a two-digit year. 世紀取決於尋找兩位數的唯一相符項目`year`該 100 年範圍內。The century is determined by finding the sole occurrence of the two-digit `year` within that 100-year range. 例如，如果設為 2029，100 年範圍為從 1930年 2029年。For example, if is set to 2029, the 100-year range is from 1930 to 2029. 因此，30 的 2 位數值會解譯為 1930，而 2 位數為 29 值解譯為 2029年。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029. 支援的兩位數年份或四位數年份。 supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year. 傳遞的兩位數年份值 (小於 100) 會導致方法將值轉換為四位數字值，根據值，表示適當的世紀。Passing a two-digit year value (less than 100) causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the value representing the appropriate century. 如果應用程式提供支援的行事曆範圍內的四位數年份值，此方法會傳回實際的輸入的值。If the application supplies a four-digit year value that is within the supported calendar range to , the method returns the actual input value. 應用程式提供四位數字值，超出支援的行事曆的範圍，則會提供為負數值，此方法會擲回例外狀況。If the application supplies a four-digit value that is outside the supported calendar range, or if it supplies a negative value, the method throws an exception.

exception.span: 超出曆法所支援的範圍。

span.span: is outside the range supported by the calendar.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int TwoDigitYearMax { get; set; }
.property instance int32 TwoDigitYearMax
Public Overrides Property TwoDigitYearMax As Integer
public: virtual property int TwoDigitYearMax { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.TwoDigitYearMax : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定以二位數年份表示時，該 100 年範圍的最後一年。

span.span: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

value.span: 以二位數年份表示時，該 100 年範圍的最後一年。

span.span: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性允許的 2 位數年份若要正確轉譯成 4 位數年份。This property allows a 2-digit year to be properly translated to a 4-digit year. 比方說，如果這個屬性設定為 2029年，100 年範圍是從 1930年 2029年。For example, if this property is set to 2029, the 100-year range is from 1930 to 2029. 因此，30 的 2 位數值會解譯為 1930，而 2 位數為 29 值解譯為 2029年。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029. 這個屬性的初始值被衍生自 [控制台] 的 [地區及語言選項] 部分中的設定。The initial value of this property is derived from the settings in the regional and language options portion of Control Panel. 不過，這項資訊可以變更的存留期間。However, that information can change during the life of the . 類別不會偵測系統設定 中的變更會自動。The class does not detect changes in the system settings automatically. 應用程式應該將這個值表示純粹 2 位數字年份 99。The application should set this value to 99 to indicate that 2-digit years are to be taken literally. 比方說，如果這個屬性設定為 99，100 年範圍是從 0 （不是有效值大部分的行事曆） 到 99。For example, if this property is set to 99, the 100-year range is from 0 (not a valid value for most calendars) to 99. 因此，30 的 2 位數值會解譯為 30。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 30.

exception.span: 在設定作業中指定的值是小於 99。

span.span: The value specified in a set operation is less than 99.
-or-

exception.span: 在設定作業中指定的值大於。

span.span: The value specified in a set operation is greater than .

exception.span: 在設定作業中，目前的執行個體是唯讀的。

span.span: In a set operation, the current instance is read-only.
